snippet: The solo gallery debut of the resourceful performance artist Ryan McNamara is about as fluid, made-up-as-you-go-along and, yes, performative as can be.
abstract: Roberta Smith reviews performance art installation by Ryan McNamera at Elizabeth Dee Gallery.
lead_paragraph: The solo gallery debut of the resourceful performance artist Ryan McNamara is about as fluid, made-up-as-you-go-along and, yes, performative as can be.
